reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater pretty, well-made, and soft, appreciating its versatility for both dressy and casual wear.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nicely crafted, beautiful crochet-looking top.
items.body: This could never use this as a swimsuit cover. It’s too short for a swim cover, but it’s a great crochet top. It falls naturally at the waist. Definitely a KEEPER, The other reviews cited faulty manufacture, but I took my chances. This top while appearing delicate, is well made & sturdy. I found no flaws. I’m between large & XL,(180 & 5’8”). I went for XL and it was just fine. I know I will have to wash by hand or dry clean. I got ivory. Very cute. I recommend. Thanks for v the people who left reviews, most of them were great. I appreciate when reviewers state size & weight (you are so lovely for doing that!) and the color. Thx!!!! Read more
items.author: ChampagneTaste-On Budget

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a pretty top!
items.body: I was so surprised by the quality of this Top. It's gorgeous and I've received quite a few compliments while wearing it. Its soft, has a gorgeous color, and is lightweight and perfect for Summer. I'd definitely buy again, or buy in different colors. Read more
items.author: MickLiz36

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute top, small neck opening
items.body: This a cute, versatile top. The fabric is soft and seems like it will hold up well. I am a little disappointed that the neck opening is so small. It would have been nice to be able to drop one side off shoulder a bit. The neck is smaller than it appears in the photos. Read more
items.author: Kelly Young

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this boho top!
items.body: Love it! Fits GREAT and I'm a size 16. Surprisingly slimming. Boho chic. Nice fabric, not cheaply made. Read more
items.author: Lauren CK

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful top, but too small on the bottom of the top
items.body: Beautiful, top, oversized on the top.But too tight on the bottom Read more
items.author: Sundance

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty but very short and not long like product image
items.body: Pretty but short, stopping at the immediate waist level, not long enough to cover my backside. In the productimage it looks like a very long sweater or knit top. But its very short. A lot of plus size women want to cover the lower belly and backside. Especially if we're rounder in those areas. The neck seemed tight. It was not loose and comfy as expected and I actually went a size up. Read more
items.author: Rainbow

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this Crochet Sweater!
items.body: I wear a large, I ordered the closest size option a 1X. It fits really well and looks great on. I would recommend this top. It's very soft and made well. The color coordinates so well with jeans or boho inspired outfits. Read more
items.author: Regenia Ford

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Size up and fits great-well made
items.body: I sized up to 1XL-5’8 and 170 pounds. This worked great and looked good. Hung a bit lower and had a little more comfort. Read more
items.author: S Shinn

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Plus Black, Plus Beige, Plus White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
